title: Shiraz - Poplar Level
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Mediterranean, Delivery, Take-out, Persian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The newest location in Louisville.  Menu includes a sampler plate of all vegan options (quinoa, tabouli, hummus, eggplant), a vegan kabob combo, and lots of vegan sides. Will make vegetarian selections vegan including falafel served with hummus instead of tziki sauce. Vegan energy bars and other goodies available for dessert.
